Whole-class discussion

Why is water conservation important? What would happen if there wasn't enough water? What would happen if our water wasn't clean?

Discuss these questions with your group then record your reflections and questions in your Workspace. Use your sharing and group tools to view each other's responses and discuss with your teammates.
